import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({
    "Agent": ["Orchestrator", "Research", "Writing", "Quality"],
    "Latency (s)": [0.5, 2.3, 1.8, 0.9]
})
fig = px.bar(df, x="Agent", y="Latency (s)", title="Average Latency per Agent")
fig.show()
